thread.title: Teen gets help in the 'Clutch' with homecoming proposal
thread.title_full: Teen gets help in the 'Clutch' with homecoming proposal

title: Teen gets help in the 'Clutch' with homecoming proposal
text:
Show Transcript Hide Transcript 
SO WE MENTIONED HOMECOMING IS JUST AROUND THE CORNER AT SEVERAL HIGH SCHOOLS. ONE ETHENE IN KINGWOOD ENLISTED THE HELP OF A SPORTS CELEBRITY FOR A VERY SPECIAL HOMECOMING PROPOSAL. WILL YOU GO TO HOMECOMING WITH ME? SHE SAID YES! IF THAT DOESN'T MAKE IT HAPPEN, I DON'T KNOW WHAT WILL. ROCKETS MASCOT, CLUTCH, ACCOMPANIED ZACHARY BOOTH WHEN HE SURPRISED HIS GIRLFRIEND AT THE BOUTIQUE WHERE SHE WORKS. ZACHARY IS A SENIOR AT SUMMER CREEK HIGH. HIS GIRLFRIEND, MATTIE, GOES TO HOUSTON - 
Homecoming is just around the corner at several high schools, and one teen in Kingwood enlisted the help of a sports celebrity for a special homecoming proposal. 
The Houston Rockets mascot, Clutch, accompanied Zachary Bootz when he surprised his girlfriend at the boutique where she works to ask her to homecoming. And she said yes. 
"I feel pretty good. She said yes!" he said. Quick Clicks
